sense.gloss: to drive in (a nail, stake, etc.), to hammer in
to hit (a ball, etc.), to drive, to smash
to fire into, to shoot into
to devote oneself to, to be absorbed in, to be (really) into, to be enthusiastic about, to put heart and soul into, to throw oneself into, to go head over heels for
to hit (an opponent in kendo, boxing, etc.), to get a blow in
to invade one's opponent's territory, to place a stone in an opponent's formation
to pour (concrete, etc.) into a form

sdata.j: ↑基礎↑↓きそ↓に↑杭↑↓くい↓を↑打↑↓|う↓ち↑込↑↓こ↓む|のを↑忘↑↓わす↓れて、↑空中↑↓くうちゅう↓に↑楼閣↑↓ろうかく↓を↑建↑↓た↓てるとは、あなたも↑愚↑↓おろ↓かな↑人↑↓ひと↓だ。
sdata.e: It is foolish of you to build a castle in the air while forgetting to drive in pilings for its foundation.

sdata.j: ノートパソコンの↑電源↑↓でんげん↓を↑入↑↓い↓れ、ブラウザを↑立↑↓た↓ち↑上↑↓あ↓げて、もう↑覚↑↓おぼ↓えてしまったアドレスを↑打↑↓|う↓ち↑込↑↓こ↓む|。
sdata.e: I switch on my laptop, start up the browser, and type in the address I've already learnt by heart.
